entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who received Ignotus's present and is holding the Elder Wand.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as nodding his satisfaction at Harry's decision to keep Ignotus's present.

entities.name: ignotus
entities.description: Ignotus is mentioned as the one who gave a present to Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as looking at the Elder Wand with reverence and questioning Harry's decision not to want it.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as looking at the Elder Wand with reverence.

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: The Elder Wand is mentioned as a powerful object that Harry does not want to keep.

entities.name: ignotus's present
entities.description: Ignotus's present is mentioned as something that Harry wants to keep.
